forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In the tender embrace of a San Francisco night, the skies drape a mostly cloudy veil, punctuated by the gentle sigh of a west-southwest breeze. The temperature offers a cool comfort, hovering around 57 degrees—you can feel the night air, crisp yet inviting, coaxing a cozy wrap or light layers into your evening attire. As we prepare for the unfolding hours, the promise of a gracious dawn awaits, foreshadowed by the soft anticipation of a mostly sunny Thursday. A high of 65 will soon sweep over the city, with fresh, spirited gusts stirring from the southwest.

If you glance towards the horizon, you may observe the lingering whispers of fog, a subtle marine layer clinging to the edges of the coast, fashioning an enchanting tapestry of mystery. This soft haze, while keeping the chill near the bay, allows the sun to peek through by the afternoon, creating a delightful contrast against the dynamic skyline. Given this picturesque yet temperate scene, one might consider a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the gentle lapping of the waves meets the rhythmic heartbeat of urban life. Until then, layer up just enough to savor the stillness of the night, indulging in a warm cup of coffee or a simple good book, allowing the evening to unfold softly around you.
